gnat.alignment
Class LocalAlignment

java.lang.Object
  gnat.alignment.Alignment
      gnat.alignment.LocalAlignment

public class LocalAlignment
extends Alignment

An extension of the global alignment algorithm defined in the parent class.

ctraceback

int ctraceback

maxtracebacks

public int maxtracebacks
Stores the max. number of tracebacks needed for a proper result. Useful when multiple alignment are executed using the same instance of this class.

maxtimeinmillis

public int maxtimeinmillis
An alignment can be assigned a timeout value. After this is reached, the alignment is aborted and align(Phrase, Phrase) returns Float.NaN. Default: 2000.

align

public float align(Phrase p1,
                   Phrase p2)
Aligns two phrases and returns the alignment score.
When the max. time (maxtimeinmillis) is reached, alignment is aborted and align() returns Float.NaN.

traceback

protected java.util.List traceback(float[][] table,
                                   int[][][] pointer,
                                   int i,
                                   int j,
                                   java.util.List<Phrase[]> list,
                                   Phrase alignment1,
                                   Phrase alignment2)
Returns a list of aligned phrases. All traceback paths are considered by recursively calling this method, whenever a cell on the path points to multiple neighbors.

singleTraceback

protected Phrase[] singleTraceback(float[][] table,
                                   int[][][] pointer,
                                   int i,
                                   int j)
Returns the an array of length two, containing two aligned phrases. Only one traceback path is considered.
